GeneDef.label: telepath study
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are unable to learn on their own; instead, they gain skills from the experiences of those around them.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every (*DateTime)1-2 days(/DateTime), the carrier <color=#8a8ae6>gains experience relative</color> to the experience of <color=#8a8ae6>other pawns</color> in the colony.
The target can be any <color=#8a8ae6>psi-sensitive</color> pawn.
The carrier receives <color=#8a8ae6>20% experience</color> from each skill of the target.
If the skill level of the carrier is <color=#8a8ae6>higher than or equal</color> to the target's skill level, then no experience will be gained.
<color=#8a8ae6>Aptitude</color> is taken into account for the carrier, but not for the target.
